title: Episode #74 - Amber Lyon & ME
description: Investigative journalist, photographer, & medicinal psychedelic adventurer, Amber Lyon, sits w/ me in the Mancave and talks about being held at gun point, romantic frog poison dates, and ofcourse I make her walk me through her Ayahausca trip from begining to end.
